results.title: Golden Slumbers
results.creator_credit: CinéCinéma, Vycky Films, Bophana Production, Araucania Films and Davy Chou
results.brief_description: In Golden Slumbers, French-Cambodian filmmaker Davy Chou mourns the loss of lives and culture at the hands of the Khmer Rouge, but balances the somber material with a playfulness that honors the lush melodramas and mythic adventures of the glory years.

constellations_other.name: Bophana: cultural memory on film
constellations_other.description: Bophana Audiovisual Resource Center is dedicated to the collection, preservation and presentation of audiovisual material related to Cambodia. Their collection includes archival footage, newsreels, documentaries, feature films, photographs and vinyl records.

results.creator_credit_for_label: CinéCinéma, Vycky Films, Bophana Production, Araucania Films and Davy Chou
results.description: Over three million Cambodians died in the genocide between 1975 and 1979. The Khmer Rouge’s reign of terror also decimated a homegrown film industry that had flourished since 1960: movie theaters were bombed, film prints were destroyed and artists were executed. In Golden Slumbers, French-Cambodian filmmaker Davy Chou mourns this loss of lives and culture, but balances the somber material with a playfulness that honors the lush melodramas and mythic adventures of the glory years.
description_for_label: Over three million Cambodians died in the genocide between 1975 and 1979. The Khmer Rouge’s reign of terror also decimated a homegrown film industry that had flourished since 1960: movie theaters were bombed, film prints were destroyed and artists were executed. In Golden Slumbers, French-Cambodian filmmaker Davy Chou mourns this loss of lives and culture, but balances the somber material with a playfulness that honors the lush melodramas and mythic adventures of the glory years.

results.title: Glee
results.creator_credit: 20th Century Fox Television, Ryan Murphy Productions, Brad Falchuk Teley-vision and Bradley Buecker
results.brief_description: In this musical comedy, optimistic high school teacher Will Schuester tries to refuel his own passion while reinventing the high school’s glee club and challenging a group of outcasts to realize their star potential as they strive to outshine their singing competition while navigating the cruel halls of McKinley High.

constellations_other.name: Viral music videos
constellations_other.description: Gotye's 'Somebody that I used to know' was one of the internet's most viral music videos, seconded only to Queen Bey's 'Singles Ladies'.

results.creator_credit_for_label: 20th Century Fox Television, Ryan Murphy Productions, Brad Falchuk Teley-vision and Bradley Buecker
results.description: In this musical comedy, optimistic high school teacher Will Schuester tries to refuel his own passion while reinventing the high school’s glee club and challenging a group of outcasts to realize their star potential as they strive to outshine their singing competition while navigating the cruel halls of McKinley High.
description_for_label: In this musical comedy, optimistic high school teacher Will Schuester tries to refuel his own passion while reinventing the high school’s glee club and challenging a group of outcasts to realize their star potential as they strive to outshine their singing competition while navigating the cruel halls of McKinley High.

results.title: Girls About Town
results.creator_credit: Paramount, Travis Banton, George Cukor, Brian Marlow, Raymond Griffith and Zoe Akins
results.brief_description: A dynamic duo in silk and ermine entertain hick businessmen looking for a good time while in Manhattan.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Paramount, Travis Banton, George Cukor, Brian Marlow, Raymond Griffith and Zoe Akins
results.description: A dynamic duo in silk and ermine entertain hick businessmen looking for a good time while in Manhattan.
description_for_label: A dynamic duo in silk and ermine entertain hick businessmen looking for a good time while in Manhattan.

results.title: Gimme Shelter
results.brief_description: The landmark documentary about the tragically ill-fated Rolling Stones free concert at Altamont Speedway on December 6, 1969. Only four months earlier, Woodstock defined the Love Generation; now it lay in ruins on a desolate racetrack six miles outside of San Francisco.

constellations_other.name: Film-truth
constellations_other.description: The experimental documentary Man with a Movie Camera has had a lasting impact on the development of film styles.

results.description: The landmark documentary about the tragically ill-fated Rolling Stones free concert at Altamont Speedway on December 6, 1969. Only four months earlier, Woodstock defined the Love Generation; now it lay in ruins on a desolate racetrack six miles outside of San Francisco.
description_for_label: The landmark documentary about the tragically ill-fated Rolling Stones free concert at Altamont Speedway on December 6, 1969. Only four months earlier, Woodstock defined the Love Generation; now it lay in ruins on a desolate racetrack six miles outside of San Francisco.

results.title: Ghost in the Shell
results.creator_credit: Manga Entertainment, Shochiku and Takashi Watabe
results.brief_description: In the year 2029, the barriers of our world have been broken down by the net and cybernetics, leaving humans opens to brain-hacking. When a hacker known as ‘The Puppet Master’ begins involving meddling in politics, a group of cybernetically enhanced cops are called in.

constellations_other.name: Robots, robots everywhere
constellations_other.description: Steampunk aesthetics, malevolent AI and cybernetic cops push the frontiers of imagination in this Constellation inspired by Dishonored 2.

results.description: In the year 2029, the barriers of our world have been broken down by the net and by cybernetics, but this brings new vulnerability to humans in the form of brain-hacking. When a highly-wanted hacker known as ‘The Puppetmaster’ begins involving them in politics, Section 9, a group of cybernetically enhanced cops, are called in to investigate and stop the Puppetmaster.

results.title: Get Krack!n
results.creator_credit: Katering Productions, Guesswork Television and Tamasin Simpkin
results.brief_description: Having conquered the cutthroat world of satirical online cooking shows with The Katering Show, the two Kates are ready to take a Sassy Swipe at morning lifestyle television in Get Krack!n.

constellations_other.name: Sequins and sapphires
constellations_other.description: Two of the most striking costumes on the big and small screens embody the glamour of leading First Peoples ladies.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Katering Productions, Guesswork Television and Tamasin Simpkin
results.description: Having conquered the cutthroat world of satirical online cooking shows with The Katering Show, the two Kates are ready to take a Sassy Swipe at morning lifestyle television in Get Krack!n.

results.title: Geostorm
results.creator_credit: Twisted Media, Stereo D, Skydance Media, RatPac Entertainment, Electric Entertainment, Warner Bros. Pictures, Dean Devlin, Kirk M. Petruccelli, David Ellison, Dana Goldberg, Susan Matheson, Paul Guyot and Brian Adler
results.brief_description: After an unprecedented series of natural disasters threatened the planet, the world’s leaders came together to create an intricate network of satellites to control the global climate and keep everyone safe. But now, something has gone wrong: the system built to protect Earth is attacking it, and it becomes a race against the clock to uncover the real threat before a worldwide geostorm wipes out everything and everyone along with it.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Twisted Media, Stereo D, Skydance Media, RatPac Entertainment, Electric Entertainment, Warner Bros. Pictures, Dean Devlin, Kirk M. Petruccelli, David Ellison, Dana Goldberg, Susan Matheson, Paul Guyot and Brian Adler
results.description: After an unprecedented series of natural disasters threatened the planet, the world’s leaders came together to create an intricate network of satellites to control the global climate and keep everyone safe. But now, something has gone wrong: the system built to protect Earth is attacking it, and it becomes a race against the clock to uncover the real threat before a worldwide geostorm wipes out everything and everyone along with it.

But now, something has gone wrong: the system built to protect Earth is attacking it, and it becomes a race against the clock to uncover the real threat before a worldwide geostorm wipes out everything and everyone along with it.

results.title: Gentleman Jack
results.brief_description: Halifax, West Yorkshire, England, 1832. Anne Lister attempts to revitalize her inherited home, Shibden Hall. Most notably for the time period, a part of her plan is to help the fate of her own family - by taking a wife.

constellations_other.name: Pink, Pose, punk, Pilgrim
constellations_other.description: Alice Babidge's costume design for True History of the Kelly Gang sees the iconic foursome and their accomplices in dresses, a gender-expansive stance that connects to other rebellious outlooks on the world.

results.description: Halifax, West Yorkshire, England, 1832. Anne Lister attempts to revitalize her inherited home, Shibden Hall. Most notably for the time period, a part of her plan is to help the fate of her own family - by taking a wife.

results.title: Gattaca
results.creator_credit: Jersey Films, Columbia Pictures, Sony Pictures, Danny DeVito, Colleen Atwood, Michael Shamberg, Stacey Sher, Andrew Niccol, Jan Roelfs and Janek Sirrs
results.brief_description: In a future society in the era of indefinite eugenics, humans are set on a life course depending on their DNA. Young Vincent Freeman is born with a condition that would prevent him from space travel, yet is determined to infiltrate the GATTACA space program.

constellations_other.name: Dream A Little Crazy: The next stage of human evolution
constellations_other.description: Collaborators Lucy McRae and Rachel Wingfield created a ‘biological bakery’ for Architecture In Helsinki’s "Dream A Little Crazy". Manufacturing a series of mass-produced band members the clip explores speculative science and the future of the human body’s evolution.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Jersey Films, Columbia Pictures, Sony Pictures, Danny DeVito, Colleen Atwood, Michael Shamberg, Stacey Sher, Andrew Niccol, Jan Roelfs and Janek Sirrs
results.description: In a future society in the era of indefinite eugenics, humans are set on a life course depending on their DNA. Young Vincent Freeman is born with a condition that would prevent him from space travel, yet is determined to infiltrate the GATTACA space program.
description_for_label: In a future society in the era of indefinite eugenics, humans are set on a life course depending on their DNA. Young Vincent Freeman is born with a condition that would prevent him from space travel, yet is determined to infiltrate the GATTACA space program.

results.title: Garth Marenghi's Darkplace
results.brief_description: When the Hellmouth opens beneath Darkplace Hospital in downtown Romford, kiddy doctor, Vietnam veteran and ex-warlock Dr. Rick Dagless M.D. (Garth Marenghi) is the only man who can close it. Joined by best buddy Dr. Lucien Sanchez (Todd Rivers), fiery hospital boss Thornton Reed (Dean Learner), and woman Liz Asher (Madeleine Wool), Dagless must fight the forces of Darkness while dealing with the burden of day-to-day admin. From the chilling pen of best-selling horror writer Garth Marenghi comes this lost masterpiece of televisual terror. Dare you enter Garth’s Darkplace?

constellations_other.name: Sci-fi, surrealism and strangeness
constellations_other.description: Step through Portal 2 to explore the links between its sci-fi comedy and the world of film and TV.
